class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 28 - July 1, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Summer. Offered through Emory Summer Program in Paris. The history of France as seen through its art and architecture, with teacher guided visits to historical sites and monuments.
